item.title: ESTATE SALE (CARMICHAEL)
item.description:
Sale this weekend, April 22 and 23. Sale will be from 9am to 4 pm. 1825 St. Ann Ct. Carmichael 95608 near Arden and Fair Oaks Blvd.

Great sale, don't miss it.

Very nice furniture much of it antique. Books, records, costume jewelry, sewing, nice old linens, hundreds of buttons, marbles, toys, primitives, great old wooden boxes, c.1890 roll top desk, lots of picture frames, lots of beautiful dishes, bisque kewpies, japanese dolls, like new Shop Smith, great work bench, tools, wonderful flower pots, patio tables, king size bed, piano, platform rocker, lots and lots of Christmas, both old and new. Childrens books. Side by side fridge, and a 1950's running fridge. Occupied Japan items, prints, picture frames. Hundreds and hundreds of items.





  • Location: CARMICHAEL
  • it's NOT ok to contact this poster with services or other commercial interests
item.dc:title: ESTATE SALE (CARMICHAEL)

item.title: Garage Sale: This Saturday, April 23, 9 a.m.-1 p.m. (Davis) $1
item.description:
Garage sale Saturday, April 23, from 9:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m.
516 Hudson Ct. in Davis
(No early birds, please)

Some good stuff for sale at even better prices!

• Sturdy student desk
• Bookshelf (matches the student desk)
• Executive desk chair
• Fellows paper shredder (excellent condition)
• 19-inch, 1999 Emerson television (works great)
• Television and media cabinet (has wheels)
• Digital converter box
• Phillips DVD player with remote
• Kitchen items (pots, pans, silverware, wine glasses…)
• Lava lamp
• Cream color bed duvet
• Walk-behind seed/fertilizer spreader
• Brand new bottle of antifreeze/coolant
• Big batch of baseball/football/basketball cards (approximately 6,000 in all)
• Two window air conditioners
• Classic boom box with CD player, dual cassette, and remote
• Small radio and cassette player
• Men’s clothing, including casual and dress shirts and pants (most sized medium to large, 32/34 waist, 34ish inseam)
• Women’s clothing, including casual and dress sweaters, shirts, pants, skirts, and dresses (sizes range from 6 to 9) and some shoes (size 8.5 and 9)
• Some baby/child items (infant swing, toddler bouncy toy, crib bumper…)

And there’s even more! Come have a look!

Driving Directions:
From downtown Davis and from Highway 113, take Russell Blvd. west (staying in the left lane past Arlington) and turn right on Portage Bay Ave. E. Turn left on Hudson Ct.

Or just follow the signs.


  • Location: Davis
  • it's NOT ok to contact this poster with services or other commercial interests

item.title: Roseville Garage Sale- Oven, Dishwasher, misc
item.description:
Garage sale this Saturday (April 23rd) only at 104 Pennell Ct in Roseville.
The planets have finally alligned and caused my fiancee to be willing to get rid of some of her stuff! Lots of candles, candle holders, lamps, purses, pillows, womens clothes and shoes. Along with exercise equipment, heaters, and tons of books (I had to lose something in the deal).
With these items, we are also selling a gas stove (black), dishwasher (black), entertainment center and nice dresser. All going cheap.
See you on Saturday!!!


  • it's NOT ok to contact this poster with services or other commercial interests
